definition: so small as to be invisible without a microscope
details:
adjective
- so small as to be invisible without a microscope
= example: so small as to be invisible without a microscope
= synonyms: microscopical
- extremely precise with great attention to details
= example: extremely precise with great attention to details
- visible under a microscope
= synonyms: microscopical
- of or relating to or used in microscopy
= example: of or relating to or used in microscopy
= synonyms: microscopical
